metadata.title: CVE-2021-39926 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the Bluetooth HCI_ISO dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to3.4.9 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
